raw akas.title: Nuan Nan De Ai Qing Yu Zhan Zheng

akas: Nuan Nan De Ai Qing Yu Zhan Zheng (original title)
Mr. Guo's Love World-wide (English title) (complete title)
akas from release info: Nuan Nan De Ai Qing Yu Zhan Zheng (original title)
Mr. Guo's Love World-wide (English title) (complete title)
imdb.plot outline: Guo Dongsheng, who has been working overseas for ten years, returns home from abroad. The young and rebellious daughter could not understand her parents' divorce and going abroad. Guo Dongsheng's ex-wife was deceived in America and came back home to borrow some money. Qing Zi, who has a crush on Guo Dongsheng, goes after him all the way. The daughter generates greater aversion and misunderstanding towards her parents. Guo Dongsheng feels ashamed and uneasy and wants to compensate for his negligence as a father. The daughter has already regarded her aunt, Shen Lian, who has taken care of her for more than ten years, as her closest person in her mind. Shen Lian warms the father and daughter with her selfless love and tolerance and helps them to go through the difficult period. The daughter gets disappointed thoroughly and signs a mutual non-interference contract with her father after she knows that her father was a worker instead of a boss when he was abroad. Only when Shen Lian was diagnosed with incurable disease, did the father and daughter know that Shen Lian was hiding her illness all the time so as to not be a burden to them. Guo Dongsheng has already fallen in love with Shen Lian gradually. Shen Lian died and the daughter realized the goodness of life. Middle-aged Guo Dongsheng also completed his transformation as a father. The father and daughter tear up the contract, eliminate unpleasantness and hug each other tightly.
